channel.title: Need help with a couple of things
channel.description:
NOTE: I AM USING A DELTASCAPE BASED SOURCE.
1. I was wondering how you would add pk points. so that if you kill someone you recieve 2 pk points. If you kill the same person 2 times then you dont get any pk points.
when you get pk points i want it to sendmessage
Playername has killed playername and now has x pk points.
2. I was wondering how to change a part of the wild (mage bank) and make it multi so you can team on people. i know i need to search isinwild in my player.java but i dont know what to do from there.

item.title: Need help with a couple of things
item.dc:creator: @njr99 njr99
item.description:
@njr99 wrote:

i tryed to code the pk points thing but it wouldnt work, and i compiled, no errors. But no pk points

Read full topic
